website_summaries.verdict: The improved S Pen goes a long way to making this high-end tablet worth the extra cost, but if you're not sold on the stylus, it's easy to find a better deal.
pros: Samsung's Galaxy Note 10.1 (2014) has Android 4.3, impressive processing muscle, two fully loaded cameras, and a light, portable build
Improved S Pen features boost the tablet's productivity potential
cons: The faux leather back cover looks chintzy, and handwriting recognition is still imperfect

customer_reviews.title: And the veredict is....
customer_reviews.text: The good: -Wacom S pen is superb and taking notes in class is really something else. -samsung has some good apps The bad: -laggy - it's too delicate, anything more than soft pressure on the screen ( and back side of the tablet) will discolor the screen like a budget android tablet, yuck! The ugly: Holding it in portrait mode, you will always accidentally hit the back button, very poor design. NOTE The processor in the wifi only model is much slower than the one with LTE capabilities (exynos vs snapdragon) no idea why they made it with different processors.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tablet with a beautiful screen!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful tablet with excellent construction. I purchased this item used and unfortunately had WiFi issues after about a week. However, the seller was extremely helpful in returning my item and getting me a refund. Although I experienced issues with the tablet I received, I have other Samsung Galaxy tablets that I love and would always recommend a Samsung tablet if you are looking for a high quality item with a beautiful screen for the right price. I would definitely recommend this tablet and am already in the market for purchasing a replacement for mine!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Dorr

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tablet
customer_reviews.text: This is truly the "magical" tablet Steve Jobs meant to talk about when he introduced the iPad. (Yeah I know, this is several years later ;-)) I just got back from a work conference where I used the S Pen in conjunction with an app called "Papyrus" to take notes and embed slideshow images into letter-sized digital pages that I can actually go and print out in color or B&W directly from my tablet. Not to mention, it is the clearest, most crisp e-reader for PDFs and Kindle books I've seen; the high-resolution display is showcased well in the high quality fonts, giving ebooks an easy-on-the-eyes appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great tablet with stunning display
customer_reviews.text: Huge screen, vivid display, easy to handle. If you are a big fan of the Samsung Galaxy phones you will love this tablet. I did allot of research before buying this one and I believe it is the best out there. My only complaint is that it is not compatible with Adobe flash player. There are 3rd party apps and software that can help with that. Compared to the apple devices this one is a nose ahead. Otherwise when you compare this tablet to other android devices it blows them away in many areas. Ease of use, portability, battery life are excellent. Glad we went with the 2014 version.
customer_reviews.author: Avidbookdealer

customer_reviews.title: The processor is fast so as long as you have a decent internet connection you can stream videos at a high resolution easily. The
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a refurbished one and it works very well. The screen has grrat resolution and color. Very response touch controls and the stylus it comes with is suprisingly accurate for sketching. The processor is fast so as long as you have a decent internet connection you can stream videos at a high resolution easily. The speakers as well have great output. The larger screen size makes typing on the keyboard easier if you don't have an external one. The only real issue i had was the battery life. The awesome screen sucks up the battery life very quickly if you have the brightness up.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and fast tablet
customer_reviews.text: Samsung truly makes the best tablets. Micro sd slot, 3gb ram, 1.9 ghz quad core processor, multitasking on this tablet is a breeze. I would not buy an ipad over a galaxy note tablet ever. Ipad is slow and clunky. I got this tablet on sale for 350$ during black friday and usually this tablet retails for well over 500$. If you can get this at a reduced price, it is a dealbuster. Even at 500$ for everything that it does you will not be in the market for a replacement tablet for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: David Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: I think they have the Software Right!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this after owning the previous Galaxy Note 10.1, they are both fantastic devices but the 2014 device has much more power and seems to me they have the software down now. I like it and will probably buy the next one when it is released. I also own the Microsoft Pro 2 and two months after I purchased it they released the Pro 3..... this (the Note 10.1 2014) is lighter and has become my daily driver. I may purchase the M.S. Surface Pro 3 but I like the Galaxy Note!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Miller

customer_reviews.title: I think we would have loved this better if it didn't have battery issues from ...
customer_reviews.text: I think we would have loved this better if it didn't have battery issues from the start. Everything else about it was perfect and exactly what we wanted, but the battery would only last for about 2 hours off of the charger before failing. Another $50 and some replacement work got it back to factory specs, but's it's a shame to buy something on my favorite and most trusted site that passed QA with an issue like that.
customer_reviews.author: CorgiZack

customer_reviews.title: Good but...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tablet but there is something you need to know. With Android Kitkat running on it you cannot move apps to the SD card. A 16GB device will quickly run out of room. The only solution is to root the device and install an app such as Link2Sd that will move apps to the SD. You will be able to delete all the bloatware off it as well so I would do this anyway.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gomes

customer_reviews.title: she's had this for at least 6 months now and everything's still working great, she was a little overwhelmed at first because ...
customer_reviews.text: got it for the wife after the dog stepped on her last one. the deciding factor in getting this one was that it had a stylus/drawing pen. at first she wasn't sure what she'd use it for, and now she keeps telling me that she couldn't imagine ever having a tablet without one again. she's had this for at least 6 months now and everything's still working great, she was a little overwhelmed at first because there were so many options for everything and so many fun new apps to discover and learn.
customer_reviews.author: tommyboy

customer_reviews.title: Samsung is a 'flagship' developer of Qualty Products!
customer_reviews.text: This, my 2nd Galaxy 10.2 (2014 Edition) tablet purchase was for my GF at Christmas. I loved the features of the 1st one so much I paid very close attention so I wouldn't miss out on anything that Samsung offers in considering another possible purchase. I have many Samsung products in my home and, as of recent, my mobile life, that I strongly recommend them as a 'flagship' developer and producer of quality products We will always consider the Samsung product line first... before any device purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joe A. Zills

customer_reviews.title: Love this Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I started out with the Note 8.0 and graduated to this for a larger screen. I'm a former iPad fan so that's what I'll compare it to - this item is much lighter than my iPad (2nd Gen, full size) and has a beautiful display that is crystal clear and sharp. I play a couple of games (Hay Day and Candy Crush) and everything works smoothly in the games, including the display. This tablet seems to be super fast compared to my 8.0 version and I wouldn't take anything for it!
customer_reviews.author: KSS 0077

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is fabulous!! I accidentally smashed my old tablet of the exact same model and needed a replacement. This tablet is perfect and I think works even better than the one I spent big bucks on in 2014.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST TABLET for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST tablet for the money! I love this new model- the graphics are GREAT, the size is perfect, I love the note and stylus part. Its super easy to use, and I know I won't "outgrow" it any time soon. There are so many features, that I haven't even utilized- or even know how to use. But this gives me something to aspire to, and is there if and when I need them. Watching movies and videos are amazing on it! Another AWESOME Samsung product!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Blond

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my 2012 Note 10.1 version. It served me admirably for 4 years, the last 3 of which were hard use in a fairly remote area of the Philippines. Although there are a very few things that it cannot do since it isn't a laptop/desktop (those have been mainly software restrictions, not due to hardware) they are nothing to keep me from looking forward to another 4 years of reliability here with this 2014 version.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sisk

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this tablet in 2013 and hate it because of the battery life
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tablet in 2013 and hate it because of the battery life. all the features for this tablet are amazing but the battery life is ZERO. I have deleted multiple applications to see if this would resolve the issue and battery life is still poor. If I can get tablet fixed to extend battery life I would rate tablet a 10, however I am quite disappointed with tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Love it +++++
customer_reviews.text: I love the new Samsung Note 2014 edition. I sold all my I pads and I can't put it out of my hands. I love the fast responsive screen and the pen,. I use it at work and were able to put it tons of app for my work. Excellent WiFi and battery life. I will never go back to the" I" thing, ever again. It is worth the money and then some.
customer_reviews.author: Pallpoul

customer_reviews.title: Seriously!
customer_reviews.text: An amazing tablet for the cost!!! So worth every penny. with the same specs as the pro 10.1 tab but this having the note feature on top of the 3gb ram and not just the 2 with the PRO tab ( which makes no sense considering they cost right about the same) is lighting fast!!! I freaking couldn't ask for a better tablet with the size of screen! Great job Samsung!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Asher

customer_reviews.title: Excllent Product
customer_reviews.text: The Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 2014 Edition is everything that a person would want. The images, speed, holding, are everything that I was looking for and then some. I do not see where anybody could have a problem with it.The setup was super easy and I really like the ability to write notes on it. Really comes in handy when you go somewhere like to the grocery store or anywhere you need a note.
customer_reviews.author: MI2432

customer_reviews.title: I do feel that the battery life on standby mode is not that great. My iPad 1 (1st generation) truly had incredible ...
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is truly a beast. It is the most powerful tablet I have ever used. I do feel that the battery life on standby mode is not that great. My iPad 1 (1st generation) truly had incredible standby time. It was anemic though so there is a tradeoff. Want power? Powerful dual processors eat power. It is a fantastic little device, though.
customer_reviews.author: Project Pete

customer_reviews.title: Amazing...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this tablet before, but it came broken... Surely it was a lemon because I received my second tablet with the help of customer support (which is phenomenal). I've had a while to play around with this tablet and I'm impressed. You get a $25 Google Play card and $50 Samsung App card and a bunch of other goodies. This tablet is everything the reviews said it was and then some. The only reason I was skeptical is because of the lag, but with the update, nearly all lag is gone. Audio is nothing to boast about, but I was pleased overall. I would defiantly recommend this product if you are thinking about buying this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a year ago. It is beautiful, fast and light but the battery life is terrible and erratic. I have never gotten more than 3 hours out of it even when new. Now it is draining rapidly to zero, going into power save. If I shut down and reboot it will show significant battery life, then will drain rapidly again. Samsung tech support was not helpful. This was a lot of money, and I wish I had purchased an I-Pad.
customer_reviews.author: ValleyGirl

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE! I have a case
customer_reviews.text: VERY NICE! I have a case, screen protector and a keyboard. I use the tablet more now. S Note is very nice. The battery life is longer than my laptop when i watch netflix. The only thing i want is NFC! It is good tablet for personal, business and general use. It could use an "ahhhh" feature that makes it special. The s pen is great.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like
customer_reviews.text: I chose this tablet in order to use in the field for reviewing engineering drawings with clients. The stylus helps with making revisions on the fly. Batter life has been pretty good - so far. The Android OS is bulky and slow, but that is not Samsung's fault. I would probably spring for a Surface with a keyboard next time.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Van Dyk

customer_reviews.title: Loving this tablet!
customer_reviews.text: Responsive, gorgeous screen resolution, nice battery life and a stylus that I now can't live without. I was able to create a nice powerpoint presentation on a train before a job interview. It took me about 10 mins to get familiar with the program, but after that, was able to create 4 slides in about 30 minutes using on screen keyboard and stylus. No laptop needed! Still learning about all the functions this tablet has to offer but no regrets passing on an iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Tilia14

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife when she finally said she was ready for a tablet. She loves it and wishes she had made the transition from laptop to tablet sooner. She uses it primarily for email and face book. We chose this model to go with our Note 3s. When my ancient iPad expires I will also make the switch.
customer_reviews.author: Creb

customer_reviews.title: Broken wont even take a charge
customer_reviews.text: The galaxy note wont even take a charge.its broken.my son in The philippines so upset
customer_reviews.author: Dennis L. Watts

customer_reviews.title: it works great and the battery life is outstanding
customer_reviews.text: My Wife loves this tablet, we replaced a Ipad 2, it works great and the battery life is outstanding. I got a 64 GB chip and can put music and video on it directly. I like not having to have some kind of special program to sync program (itunes)the tablet. All the apps I had on the ipad I wanted to keep were available in the android store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good for those who are bad at keeping up with paper
customer_reviews.text: i like this tablet, it performs rather well and the s-pen can even translate most of my horrible handwriting into text most of the time. I wish it had better speakers but you can't have everything in one package i guess. Also the replacement pens are costly so try not to loose them
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: cheaper alternative for iPad.
customer_reviews.text: I use it everyday in class. its so useful. you can take your own notes or write on pdf files. its reasonably fast and usually doesn't glitch. I would definitely recommend it to everyone looking for a cheaper alternative of an iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: My favorite tablet, especially with the newest firmware updates
customer_reviews.text: My favorite tablet, especially with the newest firmware updates. Fast, flexible, and amazing for taking notes. I will split screen to watch videos on 1/3 of the screen and take notes on the other 2/3. Great for school, and an amazing tablet even without the extra functionality.
customer_reviews.author: A. B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for School
customer_reviews.text: It's great! I did lots of research on why I wanted this tablet. I am using it for school and found it to be a great addition to my graduate studies. The screen is large enough to read research articles on it and I surprisingly found that Adobe Acrobat to be a good PDF annotation app. I primarily use it for school and productivity purposes. I thought the S Pen would be too small and I would need to get a larger one but it really isn't that bad, once you get used to it. So depending on how you will use the tablet, will depend on if you will like it or not.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: The fact that it functions as a tablet and can be used to take notes is awesome. It also takes much better pictures than a smart phone and the battery last much longer too. Yes, its expensive, but you need to look at the value. I use this for business and for fun, when I work and when I travel, for taking notes, taking pictures, writing lists, watching movies, mapping routes, video chatting with family... this device has unlimited functionality. Only problem- it is very new, so apps aren't always made for the device, but hopefully this will change soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's so useful having a tablet with a stylus
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't live without this, it's so useful having a tablet with a stylus. The ONLY drawback is the charger is usb 2.0 and takes a long time compared to my newer devices, and after having it two years the charge only lasts about 3 hours in full use, not so great.
customer_reviews.author: Darin Somma

customer_reviews.title: So far I'm not impressed at all. The tablet ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm not impressed at all. The tablet runs out of battery very quickly and after being plugged in for quite a while, sometimes it will still not charge or it says it's charged and after 5 min of playing a game it's already saying it needs to be plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Try it!
customer_reviews.text: Now I was a bit sceptical purchasing this product from Amazon Warehouse, but it was also the best deal that I could find at the v time. I purchased it expecting some sort of cosmetic difficiency but to my amazement, in my estimation it was just as brand new! The warranty and all still stood. Its a good product, not perfect but a good companion
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This device has a great screen with high definition and good color
customer_reviews.text: This device has a great screen with high definition and good color. I like the stylus and the way it works with the software. The battery is non-removable and it takes a long time to charge. They should improve on the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my mother and she loved it. Her other tablet had been stolen by the airlines and couldn't wait to get this so she could take it everywhere with her to read, play games and have everything she needed with her.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Thomerson

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Tab S, and better than ipad.
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is great because the stylus is actually responsive with sensitivity. This tablet supports split-screen dual apps. I wish Samsung would continue this series, its gold.
customer_reviews.author: BuddyLee

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy Note 10.1
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing the Galaxy Note III phone, I wanted the 10 inch tablet as well. It has all the bells and whistles you would expect. The picture in incredibly clear and bright. It is very light weight and the charge lasts a long time. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Foltz

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Note 10.1
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tablet for I'm using already the Samsung Galaxy 4 and wanted something as good as that. Wasn't disappointed. Works great, is compatible with my computer, works with outlook which Ipad doesn't. Can only recommend tablet and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf R. Pech

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on this. I had an older model I gave to my 5 yr old grandson. Still getting used to where everything is on this one. The keyboard is more user friendly than prior models but I miss the emoticons on my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Sociologist

customer_reviews.title: Glad I went with this tablet
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new tablet and have had no issues at all. I love being able to write out my homework and then convert it to text for submission in class. This is way faster than typing. Screen quality is excellent as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great for Work and Fun
customer_reviews.text: It's been so easy to adapt to this - works just like the phone. So much faster than any iPad I've experienced. I love the Android system, and the Office tools are compatible with my work programs.
customer_reviews.author: Dria

customer_reviews.title: 'I like it'
customer_reviews.text: I have the previous version Note 10.1, this one was for my daughter she is very happy with it. I can tell the screen resolution is better of course and fast processing speed. If you have the bucks, go deluxe.
customer_reviews.author: DUB "Craig"

customer_reviews.title: Its nice to present docs from the tablet and they can ...
customer_reviews.text: I use it for Real Estate. Its nice to present docs from the tablet and they can sign them on the tablet. Then email it to them right before their eyes! Smooth flow, screen is bright, battery last.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Such a good tablet
customer_reviews.text: Very nice look, size and much lighter than an Ipad 2! The ability to share files between my pc and tablet makes it much more useful than an ipad. I like the pen facility and the quality of writing is as if you are drawing on a piece of paper plus the advantage of erasing what you have drawn! For my job as an interior designer this is a must have tablet. The only thing is being very much used to apple products it takes some time to get used to all the possible customizations and navigation, but then after that you discover you can do much more with this type of tablet.
customer_reviews.author: tinatry

customer_reviews.title: Best  stylus-based tablet.
customer_reviews.text: This the best tablet that attracts you with the S-pen features. Two-screen mode is an added advantage. Hope in future Samsung would bring 'two-screen same application' option for more applications. It weights average on hand, cannot hold it for long hours; However, with S-pen you prefer to write on it as if it were a notepad/diary by keeping it on the table - which means I am not worried about the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Mahendran

customer_reviews.title: This thing is sweet
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp looking picture on this, beats the Ipad in my book. Super fast and very light but a tad bit over-priced. Still its the best tablet with or without the stylus, better than the nexus even.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works just like it said it would. Excellent tablet and a stylus that stores onboard is great. Now, if Samsung would just relearn that.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence A. Wallen

customer_reviews.title: For the wife
customer_reviews.text: I really have never used this yet since I can't get the wife and son off of it. So that must mean it great and work fine with plenty of speed. Happy wife happy life!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: and how easy you can navigate through the menus
customer_reviews.text: I am just knowing the tablet since this is the first unit I have bought. I am really impressed with the screen resolution, and how easy you can navigate through the menus.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Solís

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this tablet for the past 2 weeks now, and I can say that i really enjoy it!! It does so much more than you would even think possible. The stylus and the air functions are different and unique. The only downside that I've noticed so far is that the battery life is a little low - especially when it gets to about 20%, the battery seems to drain even faster.
customer_reviews.author: Darel McRae

customer_reviews.title: new 2014
customer_reviews.text: its fast and wrks well I would recommend it to anyone. I have found no issues with it and it lasts long and charges quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Mattfeld

customer_reviews.title: Issues with Google Playstore
customer_reviews.text: I loved the tablet and features, but could not connect to Google Playstore to restore my apps. Samsung support was responsive and tried to help, but told me I had to send to them and service would take 2-4 weeks-not what you hoped for in a new expensive tablet. From what I saw on the web when researching my problem, it looks like this issue is present in several Samsung tablets. I bought this to replace my now defunct iPad version 1. I wanted to avoid Apple and stick with an Android tablet, like my phone. I was so disappointed it did not work for me. Features are really cool if you can make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen B

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Just okay build quality. Excellent screen. Good shipping speed.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Just okay build quality. Excellent screen. Good shipping speed.
customer_reviews.author: CPT KILO

customer_reviews.title: A bright star
customer_reviews.text: This pad is excellent. It has a brilliant screen with exceptional resolution. Everything advertised about the pad works as advertised. The S pen is extremely useful. The dual quad processor works well and makes the response of the pad quite rapid. However, I wish there were separate charging and USB ports. It would also have been better to not have a port on the bottom of the pad. It is difficult to leave the charger in while using the pad although the correct case allows such a connection. This would lower my rating a bit but only by about 1/2 star because electronically, this pad is a clear 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: There is a learning period, and I am not yet completely thru. The features I appreciate, almost instant on, the software that connects to main computer, easy carry and size like the notebook I use..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer AGCSR

customer_reviews.title: Great screen resolution
customer_reviews.text: Great screen resolution, but it still suffers from not being about to access some sites as my old Galaxy II tablet.
customer_reviews.author: timOBX

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Screen!  Fast!
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet! I've bought a couple of them already and everyone loves them! Samsung's Touchwiz is the only downside to this tablet as it CAN cause some lag. However, this has only happened after extensive use and tons of multitasking. Definitely a quality tablet!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful screen and very fast most of the time
customer_reviews.text: Trim hasn't fell off like other reviewers said but there been weird keyboard glitches Gray Sometime but it be because my storage is filled up and not everything can go on the micro SD card.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: love the galaxy note 10.1
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it mirrors my galaxy s4 phone. I am still learning all the features, the battery life us very goof. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Kappes

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.text: I love my 2014 Galaxy Note 10.1. While my husband is watching endless football, I can sketch new jewelry designs for my Etsy shop - ThenThereWereThree.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: still fast as of today (2016 Mar). The only ...
customer_reviews.text: still fast as of today (2016 Mar). The only problem is that the light sensor has not been working well when I got it.
customer_reviews.author: cx

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is amazing. I'm using it to write the review. It's very functional. It has great features! Fast shipping it actually camea day early! I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: melissa allen

customer_reviews.title: Great performace.
customer_reviews.text: It works great. Handles tasks fast and the user interface is very nice. Everything is easy to find and if you just find and watch a 5 minute tutorial on it on YouTube the shortcuts are amazing. I also recommend buying the 16 GB as 64 GB Class 10 SD cards are cheaper then the upgrade price for 32 GB. SD card -->
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Trout

customer_reviews.title: The best tablet out there
customer_reviews.text: The best tablet out there. i have use its 2012 edition for 2 years now an upgraded to this. Im impressed!!
customer_reviews.author: lady

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and perfect best gift I ever bought myself. I am now saving for the note 3 phone. This is one of the best items on the market
customer_reviews.author: Pat B

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift for Husband
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the tablet as a Christmas for my husband and he loves it. He is anti Apple products so of course Samsung it is. Great to watch movies and surf the web. He uses it all the time and its great for travel which he does a lot of for work.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Lassiter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great price... bought 6 months ago ..NO PROBLEM SO FAR.....
customer_reviews.author: samuel k.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Bought one first for myself, then one for my daughter who is an artist. We are both extremely happy with our tablets. :)
customer_reviews.author: RealTalk

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new baby!!! I love that I can have my phone (also a Samsung Galaxy), TV, and tablet interact with one another. The resolution is WONDERFUL!!!!
customer_reviews.author: nacobe

customer_reviews.text: What can I say? Best of the best! My second Samsung Note. Beats I Pad when I compare it to my mom's.
customer_reviews.author: sue hassett

customer_reviews.title: excelent product
customer_reviews.text: I been using Android tableto since 3.0 iconia a500 acer and the devices of this kind are excelent for listen music, reading, viewing documents, watching videos, but they are bad for capture documents or notes from a meeting but with the s-pen, taking notes from a meeting become really easy and natural, I love this tablet
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Bustos

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I want to give this Galaxy Note more stars, but the darn thing died on me.
customer_reviews.author: Dgal

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge improvement over my last tablet, but that's expected considering my old one is from 2010. I have yet to use all the features; however, everything I have touched has had a smooth and fast response. I have not experienced any of the hang-ups/crashes others have experienced. I would recommend this highly if you are interested in an Andriod device with the best in class resolution, processing, memory, and with Samsungs unique features (S-pen, etc).
customer_reviews.author: Nuroppo

customer_reviews.title: with no doubt, best purchase ever.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived ahead of schedule, arrived undamaged, and as a gift it was received with exceptional pleasure. Checked the other one ( I thing), and the galaxy is a better buy all around, hands down.
customer_reviews.author: krdl46

customer_reviews.title: She writes her notes on the tablet and she said it fits perfect in her bag and its easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I brought this product for my daughter and she loves it. She writes her notes on the tablet and she said it fits perfect in her bag and its easy to use......Best Buy
customer_reviews.author: TriniAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall a nice tablet.
customer_reviews.text: I unfortunately got a bad unit initially (it happens) and had to exchange it because there was a strip of the screen that wouldn't respond to the S-pen. However, the rest of the tablet is fantastic and Amazon customer service was amazing when it came to returning this and getting a new one sent out right away. There isn't really much bloatware, which I always appreciate, and my handwriting is legible and even pretty. Of course it isn't like paper and pen but it's the closest I've come across, personally. It's very responsive, has a nice display and a lot of neat features. Overall I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Zhia

customer_reviews.title: I hate to say
customer_reviews.text: I'm doing this review on my Galaxy Note 10.1. .......It was a high price.......But you get what you pay for. ......its fast ! well made .....I had a Dell laptop and sold it to my sister. ....THIS is a lot more versatile and easier to use and carry around. .......I hate to say. ......I don't use my desktop very much any more. ......This is my go to machine. .....what ever I need to do I can do on it..........Spend the money. ......You will be Glad you did. .....
customer_reviews.author: Bad Attitude

customer_reviews.title: Beware...known for battery trouble
customer_reviews.text: Battery died after a year and getting a new one that works again has been a battle. I'd be screwed if I didn't have a friend who does this for a living. Samsung hasn't been kind to him with the known battery trouble
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: great tablet
customer_reviews.text: bought tablet right befor the price jump so its met all of our expectations the screen is crystal clear .
customer_reviews.author: SA1969

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend if you like android. You can get way more out of a tablet like this than an iPad. BUT if you don't know what you're doing, just settle for an iPad, they have more tablet apps anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Ashten

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet so far...
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is great!! I have a note phone already so this tablet made it more fun with the different options for the s-pen
customer_reviews.author: T.K.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great table
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet Very fast and the screen is very bright and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Evans Family

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have no regrets getting this tablet. It just updated to Kit Kat so now I like it even more...
customer_reviews.author: Demyja

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy note 2014
customer_reviews.text: I use a lot of Samsung products. I just bought this one. it has all kinds of functions. I am still.learning how to use all of the functions. I fell in love with it at the store and found a better price for it at Amazon. also the 3 year warranty is priced better than stores.
customer_reviews.author: Angelia Slaughter

customer_reviews.title: the tablet as advertised, no worn visible on the ...
customer_reviews.text: the tablet as advertised , no worn visible on the tablet , works great
customer_reviews.author: Smokey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, best android tablet with great battery life and processing power
customer_reviews.author: Cody Christy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Perfect size! The 12 inch is bigger of course, but heavier and kind of goofy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Keith Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the product. I use this tablet primarily for digital art. I did a lot of research beforehand. It was difficult to find a bad review anywhere. I say go for it! You will love the S Pen (stylus).
customer_reviews.author: trifle007

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is great. The S pen feature really helped when I was in school. It allowed me to take notes and the later convert them to text. The tablet also has a crystal clear display that is great for watching videos. This is the best tablet I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Collins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great deal, fair price, quick delivery, AND the tablet works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Note 10.1
customer_reviews.text: There is no issue at all. It came in quickly and it worked as its decriptions. I would strong recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Duoc Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love my tablet
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my tablet. My husband bought this for me at Christmas. I have been using it ever since and have no issues. Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: SHANTI KOONJAN

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: One amazing device! No words to describe my satisfaction! Absolutely Love it! 5 stars are not enough! Thank you Samsung!
customer_reviews.author: Mary L. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery life, poor game performance
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, great screen, but the battery life is terrible. I have 75% battery life left and get 10 minutes on Candy Crush before I get the low battery warning! It's doesn't do well with games period. The Simpsons Tapped Out stutters, it's unplayable. I wish I would of returned it. It was $600 when I bought it.. it just sits here. I use my Nexus 7 instead. Is this typical for others or did I get a lemon?
customer_reviews.author: BJF

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Samsung Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Excellent table it does everything I expected from a tablet. Faster, bigger screen but smaller in size, lighter than ipad.
customer_reviews.author: NELSON VALDES

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, I loved this tablet
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, I loved this tablet. The S pen is incredible. And I already received an update to Android kitkat 4.4.2
customer_reviews.author: milaronix

customer_reviews.title: best tablet ever
customer_reviews.text: best tablet ever,had an ipad mini before,this tablet can't be beat,so much can be done,still learning how to use it,very new user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Patty D
